pageSetting.title: 客户收益排名分析

attribute.value: select dmz as key, dmms as value from CSB_DMMS where DMMC= 'KHLX'

sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select b.khlx,b.khh,b.khmc, b.cksr,b.ckzc,case when b.cksy=0 then 0 else round(((cast(b.cksy as decimal(25,4))/cast(sum(b.cksy) over() as decimal(25,4)))*100),4) end as cksyzb, b.dksr,b.dkzc,case when b.dksy=0 then 0 else round(((cast(b.dksy as decimal(25,4))/cast(sum(b.dksy) over() as decimal(25,4)))*100),4) end as dksyzb, b.wysxfsr,b.sjyhsxfsr,b.jjsxfsr,b.lcsxfsr,b.dlbxsxfsr,b.gjywsxfsr,b.zhsy ,case when b.zhsy=0 then 0 else round(((cast(b.zhsy as decimal(25,4))/cast(sum(b.zhsy) over() as decimal(25,4)))*100),4) end as zhsyzb,b.pm from ( select csb.dmms as khlx , sypm.khh as khh , sypm.khmc as khmc, sum(sypm.ckftpsr+sypm.ckzbjsr+sypm.cktqzqlxkh) as cksr, sum(sypm.cklxzc) as ckzc, sum(sypm.cklr) as cksy, sum(sypm.dklxsr) as dksr, sum(sypm.dkftplxzc+sypm.dkyswslxxz+sypm.dkzcjzss) as dkzc, sum(sypm.dklr) as dksy, sum(sypm.wysxfsr) as wysxfsr , sum(sypm.sjyhsxfsr) as sjyhsxfsr , sum(sypm.jjsxfsr) as jjsxfsr, sum(sypm.lcsxfsr) as lcsxfsr, sum(sypm.dlbxsxfsr) as dlbxsxfsr, sum(sypm.gjywsxfsr) as gjywsxfsr, sum(sypm.zhsy ) as zhsy, rank() over(order by round(sum(sypm.zhsy ),2) desc) as pm from nbzz_khlrmx_$tjrq_yyyymm$ sypm inner join table (fn_getsjjg_java_qx(cast(cast($tjrq$ as char(6))||'01' as integer),$login_khdxdh$, $jgkhdxdh$)) qx on qx.khdxdh in( sypm.jgkhdxdh) inner join csb_dmms csb on csb.dmmc= 'KHLX' and csb.dmz=sypm.khlx where 1=1 and sypm.khlx = '$khlx$' and sypm.khh like '%$khh$%' and sypm.khmc like '%$khmc$%' group by csb.dmms ,sypm.khh,sypm.khmc )b where 1=1 and b.pm <= $zhsyq$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( select b.khlx,b.khh,b.khmc, b.cksr,b.ckzc,case when b.cksy=0 then 0 else round(((cast(b.cksy as decimal(25,4))/cast(sum(b.cksy) over() as decimal(25,4)))*100),4) end as cksyzb, b.dksr,b.dkzc,case when b.dksy=0 then 0 else round(((cast(b.dksy as decimal(25,4))/cast(sum(b.dksy) over() as decimal(25,4)))*100),4) end as dksyzb, b.wysxfsr,b.sjyhsxfsr,b.jjsxfsr,b.lcsxfsr,b.dlbxsxfsr,b.gjywsxfsr,b.zhsy ,case when b.zhsy=0 then 0 else round(((cast(b.zhsy as decimal(25,4))/cast(sum(b.zhsy) over() as decimal(25,4)))*100),4) end as zhsyzb,b.pm from ( select csb.dmms as khlx , sypm.khh as khh , sypm.khmc as khmc, sum(sypm.ckftpsr+sypm.ckzbjsr+sypm.cktqzqlxkh) as cksr, sum(sypm.cklxzc) as ckzc, sum(sypm.cklr) as cksy, sum(sypm.dklxsr) as dksr, sum(sypm.dkftplxzc+sypm.dkyswslxxz+sypm.dkzcjzss) as dkzc, sum(sypm.dklr) as dksy, sum(sypm.wysxfsr) as wysxfsr , sum(sypm.sjyhsxfsr) as sjyhsxfsr , sum(sypm.jjsxfsr) as jjsxfsr, sum(sypm.lcsxfsr) as lcsxfsr, sum(sypm.dlbxsxfsr) as dlbxsxfsr, sum(sypm.gjywsxfsr) as gjywsxfsr, sum(sypm.zhsy ) as zhsy, rank() over(order by round(sum(sypm.zhsy ),2) desc) as pm from nbzz_khlrmx_$tjrq_yyyymm$ sypm inner join table (fn_getsjjg_java_qx(cast(cast($tjrq$ as char(6))||'01' as integer),$login_khdxdh$, $jgkhdxdh$)) qx on qx.khdxdh in( sypm.jgkhdxdh) inner join csb_dmms csb on csb.dmmc= 'KHLX' and csb.dmz=sypm.khlx where 1=1 and sypm.khlx = '$khlx$' and sypm.khh like '%$khh$%' and sypm.khmc like '%$khmc$%' group by csb.dmms ,sypm.khh,sypm.khmc )b where 1=1 and b.pm <= $zhsyq$ ) t
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select dmz as key, dmms as value from CSB_DMMS where DMMC= 'KHLX'
